name: R5OrganizationElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Organization to FHIR R4 Organization
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Organization to FHIR R4.

target.comment: Element `Organization.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.meta` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.implicitRules` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.language` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.text` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.contained` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.identifier` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.active` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.active` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.type` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.type` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.name` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.name` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.

Element `Organization.contact` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.contact` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.partOf` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.partOf` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.endpoint` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.endpoint` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Organization.description` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
Element `Organization.qualification` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
Element `Organization.qualification.identifier` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
Element `Organization.qualification.code` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
Element `Organization.qualification.period` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Organization.qualification.issuer` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
Element `Organization.qualification.issuer` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
